last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 6
last_episode_to_air.overview: A week after the presentation the department awaits news on its fate. Fearing the worst, Katherine seriously considers her future as a visitor arrives to turn her world upside down.

name: Not Safe for Work
overview: Comedy drama series portraying a generation struggling with the realities of 21st Century working life and the camaraderie and friendships that bloom in times of difficulty.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Whitehall HR manager Jeffries wants to be briefed about a presentation to the minister, but Katherine has to help Danny cover up that his department hasn't done any work for the past two years.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Jeffries reveals the real reason she is in Northampton is to streamline the department, while Katherine is preoccupied by the anniversary of a traumatic event. She makes a spectacle of herself at a welcome drinks party, and reveals a dark secret about Anthony and their shared history.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: The minister's aide Martine arrives to pile the pressure on the Northampton team. Katherine juggles protecting Danny from himself while getting some work done.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: A mysterious tension between Jenny and Nathanial comes to a head as the rest of the team prepare to head off to London for the big presentation, but it's not a smooth journey...

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: It's the big presentation in London and Danny is still missing. Jeffries has her own issues to deal with, leaving Anthony and a stage frightened Katherine to present to the minister.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: A week after the presentation the department awaits news on its fate. Fearing the worst, Katherine seriously considers her future as a visitor arrives to turn her world upside down.
